content: {A歪头}I haven't eaten this much for ages. Thank you for the amazing meal! I wonder if I'll dream about tonight's sea urchins again when I'm <style=Highlight>lying in bed</style>.

content: {A思考}Maybe it's been too long since I've actually heard the sound of someone else's voice, so when I heard Mr. Mobai speak, I actually thought my moon crab had suddenly started talking.
